title: Is We Dumb? | Nipple Clamps. Pulling Teeth. Pens. Dominatrix.
description:
What if you were in a BDSM type relationship, but the dom made the sub only do positive tasks that had nothing to do with sex? Let's talk about that, a grandma that reads books to kids online, having a little sex with your mom, getting lost returning a rental car, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/gpmXLxwnvIQ
